Take out Wizards by running into them!

Collect Keys to open the gates!

Decent Internet connection is required to load the game.

Decent Gaming computer may be required for no lag.

This game was made by only using 1 game object. It was not only for the "Minimalistic" game competition, but also to show what is possible to do with a free account on Flowlab.io, which is a easy (in browser) game maker.

This game was inspired by the Atari game: Adventure

You can look and play with the code yourself here:

https://flowlab.io/game/view/1405051

Made for the 1 "Minimalistic Mini Competition". 

1 Music by Eric Matyas called "Arcade Puzzler" at soundimage.org
